capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an incredible witch in her own right. I've always admired her dedication to the students at Hogwarts, especially those in the Transfiguration class. Her affiliation with the school is truly admirable, and I think she's one of the most respected professors there.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts houses, and in particular, I identify as a HOGWARTS alumna. The connection to the magical world is just so deep for me, you know? It's like my roots run all the way back to those castle walls.
